title: What are some of the edgiest rap songs of all time? - Quora

response.answer_text: N.O.I.S.E by Ghostemane. If you want edgy, play this album beginning to end.  The album deals with: Nihilism, S&M, Isolation, Abuse against the self and others, and even has a song about the Columbine Shootings. After Nihil and FLESH gets better! It contains references to dystopic novels and occultism. The last few songs have a Nine Inch Nails vibe to them, especially the industrial metal track The Singularity. The album ends on a haunting, but depressing whimper that's only accompanied by an acoustic guitar. In fact almost all of his work contains references to the occult and other “edgy” topics. I still dig his music, give it a listen!

Have you ever heard of Hobo Johnson? Fan-tastic musician. Good lyrics. Needs a hug. Here, take some emotionally viable lyrics. But soft what light, through yonder window breaksIt is the east, but Juliet just puked off the balconyHow romantic No, but seriously, he writes some astounding lyrics. What makes him edgy is the fact that he screams these things at you. And at the start of one of his songs he’s got some porn audio going or something, which is pretty edgy, if you ask me.
